phrs.translation: 垂直地, 直立地, 合纵, 陡峭地
垂直伸展窗口, 垂直舒展窗口, 铅直舒展窗户, 铅直伸展窗户
对顶角, 对顶角相等
垂直并排, 垂直平铺, 纵向平铺窗口, 垂直覆盖
垂直滑动门, 立式拉门

sentences.sentence: This phenomenon indicates that Coccinella septempunctata survives the summer in the upper mountain area and can migrate vertically.
sentences.translation: 这一现象表明七星瓢虫在高山地区具有夏季生存能力和垂直迁移能力。

sentences.sentence: Carousels are essentially slideshow navigations, in which the content rotates vertically or horizontally (hence the name "carousel").
sentences.translation: 旋转木马本质上是幻灯片导航，其中的内容垂直或水平旋转（因此得名“旋转木马”）。

sentences.sentence: The oaks in the temperate belt and the plants under the mountain are scattered distinctively and vertically on the slopes of the island.
sentences.translation: 温和地带的栎木和山下的植物，这些不同树种形态的垂直分布在海岛的斜坡山是清晰可见的。
